APPENDIX B
    ACRONYMS
    COMMON ABBREVIATIONS
    ABAC
          Attribute-Based Access Control

          Application Programming Interface
    APT
          Advanced Persistent Threat

          Border Gateway Protocol
    BIOS
          Basic Input/Output System

          Certificate Authority/Certificate Authorities

          Common Access Card

          Cryptographic Algorithm Validation Program

          Compact Disc
    CD-R
          Compact Disc-Recordable

          Confidential Information Protection and Statistical Efficiency Act

          Computer Incident Response Team

          Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency

          Cryptographic Module Validation Program

          Committee on National Security Systems Directive

          Committee on National Security Systems Instruction

          Committee on National Security Systems Policy

          Concept of Operations
    CUI
          Controlled Unclassified Information

          Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures

          Common Vulnerability Scoring System

          Common Weakness Enumeration

          Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol

          Demilitarized Zone

          Domain Name System
    DNSSEC
          Domain Name System Security Extensions

          Department of Defense
    DSB
          Defense Science Board

          Digital Versatile Disc
    DVD-R
          Digital Versatile Disc-Recordable

          Extensible Authentication Protocol

          Electromagnetic Pulse
    EMSEC
          Emissions Security

          Federal Acquisition Security Council

          Federal Bridge Certification Authority

          Federal Communications Commission

          Federal Indentity, Credential, and Access Management

          Federal Information Processing Standards

          Foreign Ownership, Control, or Influence

          Freedom of Information Act

          File Transfer Protocol

          Greenwich Mean Time
    GPS
          Global Positioning System

          General Services Administration

          Homeland Security Presidential Directive
    HTTP
          Hypertext Transfer Protocol
    ICS
          Industrial Control System
    IEEE
          Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
    I/O
          Input/Output
    IOC
          Indicators of Compromise
    IoT
          Internet of Things
    IP
          Internet Protocol
    IR
          Interagency Report or Internal Report
    ISAC
          Information Sharing and Analysis Centers
    ISAO
          Information Sharing and Analysis Organizations

          Information Technology
    ITL
          Information Technology Laboratory

          Media Access Control
    MLS
          Multilevel Secure
    MTTF
          Mean Time To Failure

          National Archives and Records Administration

          North Atlantic Treaty Organization

          Non-Disclosure Agreement

          National Initiative for Cybersecurity Education

          Not Releasable to Foreign Nationals

          National Security Agency
    NVD
          National Vulnerability Database

          Office of the Director of National Intelligence

          Office of Management and Budget

          Office of Personnel Management
    OPSEC
          Operation Security
    OVAL
          Open Vulnerability and Assessment Language
    PDF
          Portable Document Format
    PDS
          Position Designation System
    PII
          Personally Identifiable Information
    PIN
          Personal Identification Number
    PIV
          Personal Identity Verification
    PIV-I
          Personal Identity Verification-Interoperable

          Public Key Infrastructure
    RBAC
          Role-Based Access Control
    RD
          Restricted Data
    RFID
          Radio-Frequency Identification
    RFP
          Request For Proposal
    RPKI
          Resource Public Key Infrastructure

          Special Access Program
    SCAP
          Security Content Automation Protocol

          Sensitive Compartmented Information

          Sensitive Compartmented Information Facility

          Supply Chain Risk Management

          System Development Life Cycle

          Security Information and Event Management

          Subject Matter Expert

          Simple Mail Transfer Protocol

          Security Operations Center
    SP
          Special Publication

          Security Technical Implementation Guide

          Software Identification

          Transmission Control Protocol

          Transmission Control Protocol/Internet Protocol

          Trusted Internet Connections

          Transport Layer Security

          Trusted Platform Module

          Telecommunications Service Priority

          Unified Extensible Firmware Interface

          Uninterruptible Power Supply
    USGCB
          United States Government Configuration Baseline

          Universal Serial Bus
    UTC
          Coordinated Universal Time

          Voice over Internet Protocol

          Virtual Private Network
    WORM
          Write-Once, Read-Many
    XML
          Extensible Markup Language
